title: Hitman Absolution Trailer (720p) (106sec) (DNP)
description:
Name: Hitman: Absolution
Release Date: TBC 2012
Platform(s): Playstation 3, Xbox 360 and PC
Publisher(s): Square Enix

Join Agent 47 on his flight through an abandoned library and see the professional killer on the shoulder as he sneaks through shadows, silently and unobtrusively off his enemies fled before his pursuers.

Thanks to the power of IO Interative Glacier 2 technology sees this in Hitman: Absolution even better and more realistic than in the Hitman series was previously the case.

ABOUT THIS GAME
************************
Hitman Absolution, the latest game in the works at IO Interactive and scheduled for 2012, on PC, Xbox 360 and PS3. Hitman Absolution follows Agent 47, a cold-blooded assassin, who takes on his most dangerous contract to date. Betrayed by those he once trusted - and now hunted by the police - he suddenly finds himself at the center of a dark conspiracy and must embark on a personal journey through a corrupt and twisted world.
